name: wid1_F2F1_module11
label: F2F 1: child's medical records (CAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: child's medical records U-Heft (photo or questionnaire): selected parameters from examination U1 to U9.

answers.label: 1: family history (e.g. of diabetes, hypertension, congenital anomalies, genetic disorders, mental illnesses)
answers.label_de: 1: Familiaere Belastung (Diabetes, Hypertonie, Fehl-/Missbildungen, gen. Krankheiten, psych. Krankheiten)

answers.label: 2: prior severe illnesses, (e.g. heart, lung, liver, kidneys, central nervous system, mental)
answers.label_de: 2: fruehere eigene schwere Erkrankungen (z.B. Herz, Lunge, Leber, Nieren, ZNS, Psyche)

answers.label: 6: special mental stress (e.g. family- or work-related)
answers.label_de: 6: besondere psychische Belastung (z.B. familiaere oder berufliche)

answers.label: 7: special social stress (e.g. integration or financial issues)
17: history of preterm birth (before the end of week 37)
answers.label_de: 17: Z. n. Fruehgeburt (vor Ende der 37. SSW)

answers.label: 20: history of previous stillbirth or neonatal death or baby with serious medical problems/impairment
25: pregnancies in quick succession (less than 1 year)
45: risk due to other serological findings
